name: Support Hero Demo
description:
Support Hero is a visual novel created with Ren’py that is set in the world of superheroes. As the player character, you have the ability to strengthen a hero’s existing power, but only if you can create a strong bond with them. The stronger the bond, the stronger the hero’s abilities become!

This is a super early build to give you a sense of the world we are building. Any donations will be put towards promotional material (business cards, banners, etc) that so far we have paid for out of pocket. 

Check out our twitter (@supherogame1) and our website (supportherogame.com).
